summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to firefighter safety; authorizing an agreement with the Office of Domestic Preparedness of the United States Department of Homeland Security for financial assistance in the total amount of $665,000 under the FY04 Assistance to Firefighters Grant Program for equipment and training; accepting the money when received; increasing the 2005 Budget of the Fire Department by making a reimbursable appropriation; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three fourths vote of the City Council.
